content: > short overview the hat is worked in the round with a circular needle bottom-up change to double-pointed needles when necessary first work rib then work stripes in stockinette stitch a pom pom is attached to the top > size newborn 12-14 /30-36 cm 1-3 months 14-15 /36-38 cm 3-12 months 15-18 /38-46 cm small - adult 20-21 /51-54 cm adult m 21-23 /54-59 cm adult xl 25-26 /63-66 cm > materials yarn drops nepal 65% wool 35% alpaca 82 yds/1 75 oz 75 m/50 g or any other yarn group c aran/worsted / 18-24 stitches / 10 ply circular or dnp knitting needles us 7 4 5 mm for colorwork circular or dnp knitting needles us 6 4 mm for the rib > colors deep ocean 8905 1 or 2 for big adult sizes medium grey 0517 1 off white 0100 1 orange 2910 - a little free video tutorial here https //youtu be/vsoor-uj8py
